byline.contributor: Francois Essomba reported from Yaounde, Cameroon, and Dionne Searcey from Dakar, Senegal.
byline.original: By FRANCOIS ESSOMBA and DIONNE SEARCEY

lead_paragraph: A week after Cameroon began a new offensive against the militant group, two attackers detonated explosives in Mémé, local reports said, killing nearly two dozen people.

headline.main: Cameroon Blames Boko Haram in Pair of Suicide Bombings

snippet: A week after Cameroon began a new offensive against the militant group, two attackers detonated explosives in Mémé, local reports said, killing nearly two dozen people.
